content:
UpgradeSafetyCheck Class

Definition

Represents the safety check that is currently being performed for a node during upgrade.

In this Article

public abstract class UpgradeSafetyCheck
Inheritance
Object
UpgradeSafetyCheck
Derived
PartitionUpgradeSafetyCheck
SeedNodeUpgradeSafetyCheck
UnknownUpgradeSafetyCheck

Constructors

UpgradeSafetyCheck(UpgradeSafetyCheckKind)

Initializes a new instance of the UpgradeSafetyCheck class.

Properties

Kind

Gets the type of the safety check that is being performed.
